quotes.quote: I've never felt like I needed to change. I've always thought, If you want somebody different, pick somebody else.
All I can say is that the only person that can stop you from achieving your goals is yourself. If you believe, then everyone else will too.
I might have a little bit of cellulite. I might not be toned everywhere. I might struggle in this area or that. But accepting that just empowers me.

Plus-sized women shouldnt think of themselves as a size. They should think of themselves as women with rich goals in life. Size does'nt mean, really, anything. You can carry your size with pride and dress in a way that you like.
Beauty is not defined by the size of you jeans.

Beauty depends on size as well as symmetry. No very small animal can be beautiful, for looking at it takes so small a portion of time that the impression of it will be confused. Nor can any very large one, for a whole view of it cannot be had at once.
Women always seemed to bring the size they wished they were to the fitting room, rather than the size that would actually fit.

Growing up, I never accepted my curves, but when I got the opportunity to become a plus size model, I was able to appreciate my voluptuous body and love myself, not only on the outside, but on the inside.
People think plus-size models don't exercise - we do! But it's about health, not forcing my body to be something it's not meant to be.
I was really tired of words like plus size, round and large. I thought, Come on, we're fat.
